医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
拜登政府收紧经纪人对healthcare.gov的访问，以阻止流氓注册拜登政府周五实施了严格的限制措施，旨在阻止流氓保险经纪人在未经消费者同意的情况下改变消费者的平价医疗法案计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Biden-Administration-Tightens-Broker-Access-To-HealthcareGov-To-Thwart-Rogue-Sign-Ups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Biden-Administration-Tightens-Broker-Access-To-HealthcareGov-To-Thwart-Rogue-Sign-Ups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2873e28-70ec-45ef-9883-4512ec3c23e6 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 20:57:00 -0400 Biden administration tightens broker access to healthcare.gov to thwart rogue sign-ups
研究深入了解监禁对青少年健康的影响研究员萨曼莎·博赫十多年来一直在研究监禁对儿童和家庭健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Study-offers-insight-into-incarcerations-toll-on-youth-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Study-offers-insight-into-incarcerations-toll-on-youth-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6374a401-1c48-4d8f-b8df-5fce4e6e7dea Fri, 19 Jul 2024 20:55:50 -0400 Study offers insight into incarceration's toll on youth health
研究可能为腹膜假粘液瘤患者的全身靶向治疗铺平道路由赫克托·G·帕尔默 (Héctor G. Palmer) 领导的瓦尔德希伯伦肿瘤研究所 (VHIO) 干细胞和癌症小组的研究人员领导的一项临床前研究结果发表在《临床癌症研究》上，为假粘液瘤患者的全身靶向治疗铺平了道路腹膜癌，一种罕见的癌症，可用的治疗选择很少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Research-may-pave-the-way-for-systemic-targeted-therapy-for-病人-with-pseudomyxoma-peritonei.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Research-may-pave-the-way-for-systemic-targeted-therapy-for-病人-with-pseudomyxoma-peritonei.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0974737-7c45-4c4a-a204-761c424b6ae0 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 20:19:35 -0400 Research may pave the way for systemic targeted therapy for patients with pseudomyxoma peritonei
揭示豆科植物-根瘤菌共生中的节律基因表达豆科植物通过与根瘤菌合作，在低氮环境中茁壮成长，根瘤菌是将大气中的氮转化为铵（植物可用的形式）的土壤细菌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Unraveling-the-rhythmic-gene-express-in-legume-rhizobia-symbiosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Unraveling-the-rhythmic-gene-express-in-legume-rhizobia-symbiosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0782e0f-2b70-4623-9dd6-479f4cc2fa8b Fri, 19 Jul 2024 19:57:23 -0400 Unraveling the rhythmic gene expression in legume-rhizobia symbiosis
Stroop-CN：轻微肝性脑病的快速诊断工具本研究由东南大学医学院附属中大医院放射科、江苏省人工智能影像与介入放射学国家实验室培育中心门静脉高压中心齐小龙博士和付俊良博士（高级中国人民解放军总医院第五医学中心感染科、国家感染性疾病临床研究中心） https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Stroop-CN-A-rapid-diagnostic-tool-for-minimal-hepatic-encephalopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Stroop-CN-A-rapid-diagnostic-tool-for-minimal-hepatic-encephalopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bacff3fe-bb7c-44e4-8f05-d75f8189f1ed Fri, 19 Jul 2024 19:43:08 -0400 Stroop-CN: A rapid diagnostic tool for minimal hepatic encephalopathy
研究强调尿液和阴道致病性大肠杆菌与复发性膀胱炎之间的联系人体拥有多种微生物，它们维持着对整体健康至关重要的微妙平衡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Study-highlights-the-link- Between-urinary-and-vaginal-pathogenic-E-coli-in-recurrent-cystitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Study-highlights-the-link- Between-urinary-and-vaginal-pathogenic-E-coli-in-recurrent-cystitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=917d88cd-962b-41d3-a1f4-f3a2943ac152 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 19:38:46 -0400 Study highlights the link between urinary and vaginal pathogenic E. coli in recurrent cystitis
新的筛查工具使用红外光和机器学习来检测多种健康状况利用红外光和机器学习，研究人员开发了一种在人群水平上有效筛查人类健康及其偏差的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/New-screening-tool-uses-infrared-light-and-machine-learning-to-detect-multiple-health-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/New-screening-tool-uses-infrared-light-and-machine-learning-to-detect-multiple-health-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c5df4e9-cb37-473c-9b52-7d7e1db045cd Fri, 19 Jul 2024 19:26:00 -0400 New screening tool uses infrared light and machine learning to detect multiple health conditions
极热警报：了解热浪对公众健康的影响根据英国健康安全局 (UKHSA) 和英国气象局联合发布的高温健康警告，随着 7 月份气温上升，预计英国部分地区将出现热浪天气。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Extreme-heat-alert-Understanding-the-impact-of-heatwaves-on-public-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Extreme-heat-alert-Understanding-the-impact-of-heatwaves-on-public-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17e36c3f-39bd-4942-a554-4a9004f7ce66 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 19:22:55 -0400 Extreme heat alert: Understanding the impact of heatwaves on public health

母体气味如何增强 4-12 个月婴儿的面部感知人类通过五种感官观察世界，但跨感官整合的能力如何以及何时出现仍存在争议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/How-maternal-scent-enhances-face-perception-in-infants-ged-4-12-months.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/How-maternal-scent-enhances-face-perception-in-infants-ged-4-12-months.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c368513f-338a-4c48-bc7b-b9cdcc25b9bc Fri, 19 Jul 2024 19:15:29 -0400 How maternal scent enhances face perception in infants aged 4-12 months
